nodes.text: Reflections on Form III: Unraveling the Contradictions of Power and Protection

Reflections of Form III: Unraveling the Contradictions of Power and Protection was a book written by Jedi Knight Aurilan, a member of the Jedi Order before the fall of the Galactic Republic. The book's subject matter revolved around the lightsaber form Soresu. A copy of this work was kept within the archives of the Jedi Sanctuary on the ocean moon of the planet Delriss.
